name: Proxima Centauri Pizza Delivery
description:
How to play:

- Move with WASD or arrow keys 

- Toggle music/sound with buttons at the top right

- Press escape to ragequit

- Toggle fullscreen with F11 (Download only)

What's happening?

You are a pizza delivery driver in a crazy alien city. Avoid crashing in the unregulated traffic while meeting tight time frames. Can you finish all 4 missions?

Tips:

- Don't drive against the traffic - try to sneak in between cars instead

- Time is not that critical - sometimes waiting for an opening is a good idea

- Each mission has a fixed RNG seed -you can learn the pattern in difficult parts

- Watch the video on this page. It covers a full run through all 4 missions

Submission for the Trijam #132

This game was produced in 3h 5:20 hours. That includes art assets (1:02), sound (0:12), music (0:20) and code (3:46).
